distedit

Class DocumentEventCapturer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
      • distedit.DocumentEventCapturer

  • public class DocumentEventCapturer
extends javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
    This class captures and dispatches the text events of the given document on which it is put as a filter. Normally a filter is used to put restrictions on what can be written in a buffer. In our case we just use it to see all the events and make a copy.
    Author:
    Jesper Buus Nielsen (modified DA4-03 2017)
